continuum.control

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Continuum

    public interface Controller
    Central point of interaction with: - Slab - Slice - Scan - Translator Created by zack on 3/16/16.

        Atom get(AtomID id)
  throws java.lang.Exception
        Retreive a single atom by ID from the datastore
        Parameters:
        id - to retrieve for
        Returns:
        atom for given ID or null if not exist

      • slice

        Slice slice(Scan scan)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Query: Execute a set of operations on a scan of time from the datastore Blocking
        Parameters:
        scan - description of the view of the slice
        Returns:
        Slice of atoms resulting from the scan includes: aggregate functions, date ranges, and groupings if applicatble
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - error reading or collecting atoms
